entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
